Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.managers

Class UpdateManager

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.api.restartable.Restartable
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.managers.UpdateManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRestartable
@Singleton public final class UpdateManager extends Restartable
Class that manages all update-related stuff.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • hasUpdateBeenDownloaded

      public boolean hasUpdateBeenDownloaded()
      Checks if an update has been downloaded. If so, a restart will apply the update.
      Returns:
      True if an update has been downloaded.

    • getNewestVersion

      public String getNewestVersion()
      Gets the version of the latest publicly released build.
      Returns:
      The version of the latest publicly released build.

    • updateAvailable

      public boolean updateAvailable()
      Checks if this plugin can be updates. This either means a newer version is available or the current dev-build has been released in full.
      Returns:
      True if the plugin should be updated.
